FileFormat.FormatDescription:
This file type which includes '_INST32I.EX_ ' file in the title is included many Windows software distributions that use the InstallShield installation software.
InstallShield is a proprietary software tool originally developed by The Stirling Group.

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: Magic bytes ‘*«yØ’, then later in the file ASCII string ‘Copyright (c) 1990-1995 Stirling Technologies, Inc. All Rights Reserve’
